hints.content: On the number line, we start at $485$ and move **right** $\purpleE{400}$, then $\blueE{8}$ more.

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 485, 885, and 893. An arrow labeled plus 400 is above the number line beginning at 485 and ending at 885. An arrow labeled plus 8 is above the number line beginning at 885 and ending at 893. !

choices.content: ![A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 485, 885, and 965. An arrow labeled plus 400 is above the number line beginning at 485 and ending at 885. ![A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 485, 525, and 533. An arrow labeled plus 40 is above the number line beginning at 485 and ending at 525.
